title: EPG Auto-Generator
description: A Python automation tool that consumes and merges electronic program guide (EPG) json data into a unified XMLTV format. Runs on a GitHub Actions workflow every 24 hours.

title: Owari Board Game Application
description: A team-based final-year university project to implement the classic Owari board game using Java and JavaFX. Included GUI development, multiplayer logic, and rule enforcement.
